title: RN NURSE Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Good, met the DON and rest of the staff as they had me on tour. Everyone very friendly, process took about 2 weeks before they called me to start orientation
Interview Questions: Can you handle the pace of the unit

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Just fine, didnt really take much time. lasted about 10 mins. The few people I did talk to were very nice. I am sure this is a very nice place to work
Interview Questions: super basic stuff, run of the mill

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very smooth. The nurse recruiter contacted me shortly after I requested more information about the available positions. She was very polite and welcoming. They are also very accommodating with scheduling interview/orientation dates.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose this field of work?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very easy and quick applied for labor and delivery I was called about an offer a few days after look forward to working there I did my clinical rotation on their labor and delivery floor and loved it
Interview Questions: Tell me about your self

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: I had a zoom interview with Ellen and it was very brief. She asked about my GPA, experience, and how I handle myself in stressful scenarios. She asked how I have dealt with a difficult classmate. I was then emailed to go for an in person interview
Interview Questions: What is your average gpa?

title: Resistered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Make an appoontment and go to the unit.
They ask something about you what they curious.
If you want to let them know, just say it. 
They  just ask you about your past workplace. That's all. No medical knowledges.
Interview Questions:
How many patients do you take?
What kinds og patient do you care?
How long do you work?

title: Nurse Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY)
Interview Descriptions: I was emailed within a matter of days after applying. After which I told told to come in for the interview, while there, I was asked to return for another day to be interviewed by another person.
Interview Questions: Mainly how to cope under certain circumstances, high level stress zones and what I would do based on certain scenarios.

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was thorough and not too stressful. They do ask you to provide references which they do check. Took a little while to get back to you but they did
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: I dropped off my resume in person and I was asked for my GPA and areas I was interested in. About 2 or 3 days later I got a call to come in for an interview. The interview started about an hour late because the person interviewing me was on the phone with her husband arguing, walking in and out of the nursing administration office. The interview was cold, just questions that got straight to the point and that was it. The person who interviewed me actually would tell me if I answered the question to her liking or not
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time that you worked on a team with someone who wasn't pulling their weight.

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward. Scenarios were given and was asked how would I resolved it. At the start, I was asked to talk about myself and what were my professional goals and why I wanted to become a nurse manager.
Interview Questions: What made you decide to become a manager?

title: Emergency Department RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (New Rochelle, NY) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Emailed about RN positions. Received phone call back about a week later asking to come in for interview. Interviewed directly by assistant DON of ED. Received thorough tour of unit and had a brief, simple interview. Then a month later received call from HR saying to come in for processing.
Interview Questions: Relevant experience

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (New York, NY) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Group interview with managers and assistant managers. Asked scenario based questions and standard interview questions (i.e. what are your weaknesses? What are your strengths?) Questions focused on prioritization,  team work, and working with diverse populations.
Interview Questions: How do you prioritize tasks?

title: Physician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: short, one interview with an attending. Repeated questions. Asking for ties to NYC. Busy hospital. Good learning experience. You also speak with PC. No lunch. No behavioral questions. No medical questions.
Interview Questions: Why do you want internal medicine residency?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Got called for interview after open. Did pharmacology exam and then interviewed with nurse manager. Hired on the spot. Recruiter called 2 days later to schedule physical. Given new employee packet. HR called 2 days after clearance. Starting orientation September 5th 2017.
Interview Questions: Why pediatrics?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: I emailed my resume and cover letter and was called back in a week.  In the interview, I did a pharm/dosage calc. exam and met with the nurse recruiter who asked a bunch of questions, she then introduced me to the department director and nurse manager.   Hired on the spot.
Interview Questions: What was your most and least favorite clinical rotations?

title: Bioinformatician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (New York, NY) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward. First, I met the leader of the bionformatics team and did an SQL tutorial while he watched. Next we talked for about half an hour about my resume and experience. Finally, I met three more members of the team and chatted with them in a low-pressure, non-formal environment.
Interview Questions: What is obamacare?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: It okay. Mn=anger, hired on the spot. Room for growth. Took the med test and passed. Got called for health and physical, HR signing document. smooth process. They are willing to answer my questions . Also asked about my past experience, why bronx let, what should I be hired. hired hired hired.
Interview Questions: Why Bronx Lebanon?

title: Costumer Services (Greeter) Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: the interview was really easy the agency contact me  by skipe   very easy  we talk abut my experience in costumer service and my labor history, my skills they explain me how the job gonna be and the pay description and all the responsability the position have
Interview Questions: do you speak Spanish

title: Emergency Department RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: Typically one or two interviews.  The interview process is pretty straightforward.  No need to be nervous.  This hospital hires a lot of new grads.  They do not hire nurses with ED experience--weird.  However, it is a great news for new grads.  After the interview (s) it may take about a month before a definitive answer.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: I sent my cover letter and resume to the nurse manager listed on Bx-Leb's website. I was interviewed 3:1 by 2 nurse managers and the education director, and then I was interviewed 1:1 by the assistant nursing director. Although the interview itself was only an hour or so, waiting to hear back from them took several weeks.
Interview Questions:
The standard questions
1. Tell us more about yourself.
2. Why Bx-Leb?
3. Why should we choose you?
And a couple more situational questions.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (New York, NY) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Tre interview process was short and sweet. The hospital is ALWAYS in need of nurses because employees come and go fairly quickly. I’d call it an introduction to the job before I called it a true interview.
Interview Questions:
What unit (of a specific set) would you prefer to work in? 

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY)
Interview Descriptions: It was laid back almost as if I already had the job. It's been almost a month and a half and I've yet to get any call back though. So make sure you ask about that
Interview Questions: They asked the usuals. Why nursing, why Bronx Lebanon?

title: Clerical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (New York, NY) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: The lines were a bit long but the interview itself was super fast. Everyone who got to the interview phase got the job, so it all happened pretty quick. Interviewer was nice and there were only a few questions as well. The program was through 1199 insurance. If a parent worked at the hospital, the insurance was able to get the child to work as an intern in the hospital for 6 weeks
Interview Questions: What are you passionate about?

title: Housekeeping Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Have to know someone working there
Interview Questions: arrested before

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: A group of health professionals reviewed my resume and asked me about my previous education.  I was asked questioned pertaining to previous experience to see if I fit their job description.  They asked about my fluency in Spanish.  I was asked how comfortable I feel engaging with people from the community.
Interview Questions: What are your future goals?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: Overall a quick and easy experience, positions are always open however they do prefer nurses with experience. Show passion for the unit you wish to work for and you might get hired if a new grad.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for us

title: Dentist In A Post Graduate Training Program Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (New York, NY) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: The interview includes a tour of the facilities.  Also there is an opportunity to meet some of the residents.  Interview was one on one.  They tell you about the program and expectations.  They ask general questions about you and try to get a sense of your work ethic and what you are looking for.  Time set aside for questions and answers.
Interview Questions: The questions were straight forward.  General questions about who you were, what you liked, what your expectations were, what are your career plans.

title: Lab Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: The internship was setup through my school bronx community college and was mandatory for my A.A.S in MLT. i did not have an official internship. They were setup through the department head of the MLT program. It was a 4 month internship with a rotation through each lab department. I had to submit medical documents and attend a safety seminar before starting. I also had to get an ID badge and we were given food vouchers for the cafeteria.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Project Manager Facilities Planning Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronx, NY) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Hired thru a head hunter. One phone interview then a in person interview.
Interview Questions: Can you do the job

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bronx-Lebanon Hospital (Bronxville, NY) in May 2007
Interview Descriptions: Interview staff was very friendly but I decided to take a job at Mount Sinai
Interview Questions: How long have you worked in Emergency?
